content.rendered:
It\’s an exciting time when you get that all important call or email to inform you that it\’s nearly time for you to upgrade your smartphone.

Whether you’re a loyal iPhone follower or a first time Apple buyer, there are some amazing iPhone Vodafone upgrade deals currently available at Fonehouse.

In this blog post, we’ve presented some of our very best iPhone deals just for those of you who are looking to stay with Vodafone or move over to the network.

iPhone X

The iPhone X was released in October 2017 after being announced by Apple as a special edition iPhone to commemorate a decade since the launch of the first handset.

It is an impressive smartphone, with a 5.8 inch Super Retina screen that delivers an exceptional viewing experience. It comes equipped with a 12MP dual rear camera, a 7MP front-facing True Depth camera and a high-speed smartphone experience thanks to the Apple-developed A11 chip with six cores (two high power and four low power). Its all back up by a significantly improved battery life so you don’t need to worry about having all of that innovative technology and running out of power when you’re out and about.

You can get the iPhone X for £61 per month on a Vodafone Red Entertainment package with unlimited texts and minutes, 8GB of data and a £10 cashback offer. As always with Red Entertainment you’ll also be able to choose a fantastic monthly subscription to either Spotify, Sky Sports or Now TV.

iPhone 8 Plus

While some customers were waiting for the iPhone X, others chose to stick with the more affordable iPhone 8 Plus. We can’t blame them; this is a really great iPhone that features a number of improvements on other handsets.

With a huge 6.24-inch Retina HD display, a 12MP  camera with larger sensors and deeper pixels, and the same A11 chip that you find in the iPhone X, the iPhone 8 Plus is a handset that seems to be constantly in demand.

For just £55 per month, on a Vodafone Red Entertainment plan, you can get your hands on the iPhone 8 Plus with unlimited texts and minutes, a massive 32GB of data and a brilliant entertainment subscription to Spotify, Sky Sports or Now TV. Plus we’ll also give you £40 cashback, just because we like to treat you.

iPhone 8

The iPhone 8 is equally as desirable as the 8 Plus, sometimes more so due to its more manageable size.

The iPhone 8 features a stunning all-glass body which is perfect for the convenient wireless charging, a Retina HD display and a 12MP camera which all combine for a sophisticated and innovative iPhone handset.

Our cheapest Vodafone contract gives you unlimited texts and minutes, 4GB of data and £10 cashback for just £43 per month on a Red Extra plan.

iPhone 7 Plus

The iPhone 7 Plus has to be one of the best Plus models to have been released.

While the design of the 7 Plus might be a little too similar to previous models, it comes with one major upgrade in that its water resistant, meaning that upon its release it became one of the most durable handsets ever. Running on the A10 chip, it is 40% faster than the previous iPhone 6S Plus and runs on an iOS that is upgradeable to the most recent version, so you won’t feel out of date.

If you’re looking to upgrade to the iPhone 7 Plus, you can choose to go for a Vodafone Red Extra plan and get unlimited texts and minutes, 16GB of data and £30 cashback, all for just £49 per month over 24 months.

iPhone 7

The iPhone 7 comes equipped with a fantastic 12MP rear camera and a great 7MP selfie camera, as well as an outstanding display and a sound quality that is a serious upgrade from previous iPhone handsets.

The iPhone 7 is now one of the most affordable iPhones on the market, and you can get your hands on it at Fonehouse for just £43 per month on a Vodafone Red Extra plan and get unlimited texts and minutes, 16GB of data and an amazing £60 cashback.

The best thing about all of the contracts and upgrades we’ve mentioned in this blog post? They all mean you can get your iPhone handset at absolutely no extra cost. Plus, with our next day delivery service, you could have your brand new iPhone the very next day and it won’t cost you a penny.

So if you’re iPhone Vodafone upgrade time is fast approaching, well lucky you because here at Fonehouse we really do have some of the very best iPhone pay monthly deals.
